{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:20.539
    | text      = No, no, no, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:36.140
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:36.980
    | text      = When you say what achievements, well,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:39.299
    | text      = the street strategic arms limitation agreement
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:41.980
    | text      = with the Soviets, the end of the Vietnam War,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:50.539
    | text      = because at the time that Nixon and Kissinger decided
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:55.380
    | text      = to open the door to China,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:25:57.339

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:02.339

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:08.180
    | text      = that on the advice of Henry Kissinger,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:25.420

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:49.059
    | text      = Yeah, sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:49.900
    | text      = An important point to bring up here though
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:51.059

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:53.019
    | text      = on the opening up of China.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:55.099

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:57.099

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:26:59.619

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:09.819
    | text      = that means anything and he didn't write the book.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:27:12.619
    | text      = To keep in line with anti-communist tradition,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = he needs to be opposed to the opening of China
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = because according to that mythology,

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = and then your script supervisor shows up and goes,

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = I'm sorry, you actually can't believe that

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:18.980
    | text      = and it would be a delight.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:20.500
    | text      = So Alex wants Roger to just get down to business.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:24.059
    | text      = What's the bottom line on this Kissinger guy?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

    | text      = What is it gonna be, 500 grand?

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker

}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:31.059

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:34.700
    | text      = Well, there's a lot here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:36.339
    | text      = I mean, first of all, when Nixon learns
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:39.299
    | text      = that the Pentagon Papers,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:41.140
    | text      = which are really State Department documents
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:44.019
    | text      = that show how the Vietnam War started,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:47.819
    | text      = how it got out of control and so on,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:50.420
    | text      = Nixon was completely unconcerned
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:52.259
    | text      = because all they showed were the mistakes

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:55.140
    | text      = of the Kennedy administration and the Johnson administration.

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:28:59.380
    | text      = They had no bearing on his administration

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:02.660
    | text      = and his handling of the war.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:04.539
    | text      = It was Kissinger who went insane.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:06.940
    | text      = It was Kissinger who demanded the illegal wiretaps
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:10.819
    | text      = of the national security staff,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:13.059
    | text      = of White House staff members,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:14.539
    | text      = and actually members of the press
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:17.180
    | text      = to try to find out who the leaker was.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:20.579
    | text      = It was Henry Kissinger who drove the break-in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:24.980
    | text      = at Daniel Ellsberg's psychiatrist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:27.420
    | text      = Ellsberg was the State Department or the NSC official
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:31.420
    | text      = who actually leaked the Pentagon Papers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:34.420
    | text      = to the media.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:35.339
    | text      = It was Henry Kissinger who convinced Nixon
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:38.539
    | text      = to have Attorney General John Mitchell
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:41.259
    | text      = sue the New York Times and the Washington Post
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:44.099
    | text      = in an effort to prevent the publication
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:47.259
    | text      = of the Pentagon Papers,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:48.819
    | text      = which really were not at all damaging to Richard Nixon.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:52.299
    | text      = Was Deep Throat really a composite of people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:54.740
    | text      = and was Kissinger part of it?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:56.900
    | text      = I'm sorry, ask it again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:57.980
    | text      = I spoke over you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:29:58.940
    | text      = Was Kissinger part of Deep Throat?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:02.940
    | text      = Was Deep Throat a composite or one person?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:05.660
    | text      = Deep Throat is General Alexander Haig.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:08.339
    | text      = Where does he come from?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:09.339
    | text      = Well, he's a deputy to Henry Kissinger.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:11.779
    | text      = He is Kissinger's Kissinger, as they say.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:14.579
    | text      = Kissinger's Kissinger.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:15.660
    | text      = Who is they in this, as they say, scenario?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:18.660
    | text      = People who hang out with Roger in the Stone Zone.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:20.779
    | text      = Yeah, fair enough.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:21.619
    | text      = Yeah, in the Stone Zone, that's all they talk about.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:24.099
    | text      = Haig is Kissinger's Kissinger.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:25.859
    | text      = Here is what I didn't think of this,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:28.539
    | text      = and it really, obviously, I didn't think of it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:31.019
    | text      = because it doesn't pertain to me,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:32.740
    | text      = but I'm sure this happened the instant Kissinger died.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:35.660
    | text      = Everybody around the world went,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:37.259
    | text      = oh, shit, I can blame so much shit on Kissinger now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:39.900
    | text      = Oh, it was Kissinger who did that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:41.460
    | text      = Now that he cannot defend himself whatsoever,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:44.660
    | text      = it was totally Kissinger.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:46.059
    | text      = All of that shit was Kissinger's idea.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:47.900
    | text      = Watergate, Kissinger.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:49.180
    | text      = He did it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:30:50.019
